pageContent:
SHOBHA 
KANKANALA 
 
Profile 
 
Seeking challenging assignments as 
Cloud Security Engineer to utilize 
acquired expertise and deliver best in 
class results. 
 
I have around 8 years of experience 
working for various projects in IT-
Infrastructure design and 
management through Azure& AWS 
Cloud, Network configuration and 
implementation and Data Center 
Operations. 
 
 
Contact Num: 
+91 8106021751 
 
EMAIL: 
Shobha.k471@gmail.com 
 
ADDRESS: H.no: D/113, Besides 
Vellanki Foods, Madhura Nagar, SR 
Nagar, Hyderabad, India. 500038. 
NATIONALITY 
Indian 
HOBBIES 
Gardening 
Cooking 
Skills upgradation  
 
 
EDUCATION 
JNTUH, Hyderabad, India 
08/2014 – 11/2016 
Master's degree in Digital Electronics and Communication 
 
JNTUH, Hyderabad, India

Bachelor of Engineering – Electronics and Communication 
Engineering 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
EY GDS- Senior Security Consultant 
08/2021-present 
 
As a consultant worked for multiple projects mentioned below.

Engineering 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
EY GDS- Senior Security Consultant 
08/2021-present 
 
As a consultant worked for multiple projects mentioned below. 
 
❖ Working for Investment Company to Perform Azure Security 
assessment using Policies -ARM Templates, Terraform, 
Sentinel codes., Alerts, Rules, resource graph query with 
JSON, PowerShell scripting also create security Baselines 
using NIST framework and Microsoft Azure best security 
practices. 
❖ Worked as a Zscaler Engineer to perform mixed operational 
& Architectural role. Created Work Profiles, forwarding files, 
Trusted Networks, update versions and troubleshoot user 
access issues with ZIA Dashboard for Pharmaceutical 
Company. 
❖ Worked as a Security Analyst for Technology third party 
Governance for TPRM assessments for Cloud as well as 
overall IT Security with Third party provided artifacts 
including SOC2, Pentest Reports and other supporting 
reports.

LANGUAGES 
Telugu – Native 
English – Fluent 
 
 
 
 Tools:  
       Zscaler, Splunk, SIEM 
tools,Service Now, NetXMS, Cisco 
Prime and Solar Winds, 
Citrix,HDAP,Wats Console, 
Route Console, Cisco Voip.  
CERTIFICATIONS 
❖ Microsoft Certified: Azure 
Security Engineer Associate 
AZ-500 
❖ AWS Certified Security - 
Specialty 
❖ Microsoft Certified: Trainer 
❖ Microsoft Certified: Azure 
Administrator Associate AZ-
104 
❖ Microsoft Certified: Azure 
Fundamentals AZ-900 
❖ CCNA  
❖ MCSE 
 
❖  Worked as a Security Engineer, Data Admin for a Migration 
project. Successfully completed the unique client 
requirement of documentation of the existing On-prem SQL 
Databases from scratch by working with Data engineers, 
perform Network/traffic Audit reports, and upon support 
Migration of the same into Microsoft Azure Platform-assess 
the required Azure services provisioning status and audit 
cloud security for Migration using ISO, NIST, EY CSAF and 
Microsoft Azure best security practices.

the required Azure services provisioning status and audit 
cloud security for Migration using ISO, NIST, EY CSAF and 
Microsoft Azure best security practices.  
❖ Worked as a Security consultant to Create Cloud Security 
standards & assessment documentation. Mapping 12 control 
domains of CCM align with NIST CSF,NIST 800-53 frameworks 
for Cloud Security for Client requirements & prepare end to 
end mapping tables for a Stock Exchange Organization. 
 
 
 
TCS - Microsoft Azure Cloud Security Engineer 
12/2018–08/2021  
 
Being part of Cloud Security & Administration Team-Take ownership 
of tickets assigned on ServiceNow to create and manage resources in 
Azure and AWS. handled couple of Projects per client requirement   
 
❖ Have experience in PowerShell scripting, Terraform, ATP, 
DLP, Azure CLI, Console and Azure Resource Manager 
templates, Visual Studio, Winscp.   
 
❖ Creating VM’s, Webapps, Logic apps, Functions, Storage,

DLP, Azure CLI, Console and Azure Resource Manager 
templates, Visual Studio, Winscp.   
 
❖ Creating VM’s, Webapps, Logic apps, Functions, Storage, 
Azure IAM, RBAC, PIM, JIT access, Key Vault, NSG’s, ASG’s, 
Azure Security, Sentinal, Load balancer, whitelist IP for NSG, 
Data bases, Azure Monitor, Powershell scripting, 
Troubleshoot VPN, Internet, DNS, DHCP, Proxy, Firewall, 
Office365, IAM, SSO, MFA, Okta, MLA Token Distribution.  
 
❖ Create Azure AD Directory, Users, Groups and assign MFA, 
RBAC, Register and Generate the Passwords.  
 
❖ Encrypt Storage Account with KeyVault, PIM, Prevent HTTP 
connection, add specific network address to grant access to 
SA,  
 
❖ Collect Audit failure data from Security Log of VM and send 
to Storage Account. Create Alerts on different metrics like 
CPU %, Enable Soft-Delete, Purge Protection, Schedule 
Malware Scan, Create ASG’s, NSG’s among vm’s, vnet’s, 
subnets.

❖ Take ownership of issues, with a sense of urgency, and using 
sound judgement to resolve within sla.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Externetworks India Pvt Ltd - Network Support Engineer 
04/2016–11/2018 
 
❖ Proactive monitoring of infrastructure using Core Switches 
(Cisco 6880, 3750,3850) Routers (1841) on Solarwinds 
monitoring tool.   
 
❖ Creating tickets with various Impact & Severity such as 
Critical, High, Medium & Low level per SLA standards for 
metrics i.e, Packet Loss, Memory utilization, AP disconnected 
from AWC controller, Internet down and perform basic 
troubleshooting with TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, Proxy, Putty, Ping, 
Tracert, SSH.  
 
❖ Conduct Asset audit and identify required devices and cables 
for Installation, Migration, Extension and Up gradation of 
ESXI Routers, MPLS Routers, NetApp Routers/Switches, ASA 
firewalls, VPN, Cisco OOB Routers in Data centers.  
 
❖ Assist to Field Engineers to Add/Removal of Blades, 
Satadoms, IDE Modules, Power cards and other hardware for

firewalls, VPN, Cisco OOB Routers in Data centers.  
 
❖ Assist to Field Engineers to Add/Removal of Blades, 
Satadoms, IDE Modules, Power cards and other hardware for 
Clusters and other hardware devices installation, 
upgradation, Maintenance for Datacentre activities.
